type.name: org.gradle.plugin.devel.GradlePluginDevelopmentExtension

method.name: plugins
method.description:
Configures the declared plugins.
param:action the configuration action to invoke on the plugins

method.name: getPluginSourceSet
method.description:
Returns the source set that compiles the code under test. Defaults to project.sourceSets.main.

returns:the plugin source set

method.name: getTestSourceSets
method.description:
Returns the the source sets executing the functional tests with TestKit. Defaults to project.sourceSets.test.

returns:the test source sets

method.name: setAutomatedPublishing
method.description:
Configures whether the plugin should automatically configure the publications for the plugins.
param:automatedPublishing whether to automated publication

method.name: testSourceSets
method.description:
Provides the source sets executing the functional tests with TestKit.

Calling this method multiple times with different source sets is not additive.
param:testSourceSets the test source sets

method.name: isAutomatedPublishing
method.description:
Whether the plugin should automatically configure the publications for the plugins.

returns:true if publishing should be automated, false otherwise

method.name: getPlugins
method.description:
Returns the declared plugins.

returns:the declared plugins, never null

method.name: pluginSourceSet
method.description:
Provides the source set that compiles the code under test.
param:pluginSourceSet the plugin source set
